attributes.action: Make it law for halal food to be clearly marked so we have a choice to avoid it
attributes.additional_details:
Halal is an evil way of killing animals for meat. 
They have there throats slit and bleed to death in excruciating pain. 
This is not fair and in modern society I feel it is unacceptable way slaughtering animals. 
Halal slaughter is a barbaric practise and I feel that all non Muslims should have the option to opt out of consuming such food. 
Please sign this petition and help give more animals the dignity and respect they deserve by making halal meat a choice and not something we have to accept
attributes.background:
I feel that as a non Muslim I deserve to have the right to have a informed choice on what meat is halal in shops. 
I feel that halal meat should be clearly marked so as I can have the option to buy meat that is not halal and has been slaughtered in a way that is humane and not plain evil
